participant_1.background:
I have no home, but I am always with my number 42.
I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a fun and active way to spend time together
i went to an all girls christian high school.
I collect memories of my time spent with my family, even though we have different interests.
my husband is a pastor.

participant_2.background:
I'm a mom of two boys who is trying to balance my music hobby and family life.
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to love folk metal.
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.
i have 3 dogs and 2 cats.
i have good health.

content.text: What's your favorite activity to do with your family?
I like to go explore new places with my sister. I'm a mom of two boys, so we can't always do everything we want, but we always try to make time for fun family outings.
That's great! I'm sure your boys will really appreciate that when they're older.
I hope so! They're my whole world.
I can see that! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love folk metal! I grew up in the Midwest, so I was exposed to a lot of different kinds of music, but folk metal is my favorite.
That's a really interesting genre! I've never really listened to it before.
You should! It's really fun and upbeat.
I'll have to check it out sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It's always nice to meet a fellow music lover.
Same here! I collect music from all over the world.
That's awesome! I wish I could do that. I'm always so busy with my family and work that I don't have much time to explore new music.
I understand that. It can be hard to find the time. But it's always worth it when you find something new that you love.
I agree! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Well, if you ever need any recommendations, I'm always happy to help.
